## Transaction class

An abstraction for creating, signing and broadcasting transactions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Transaction 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)({ nonce, value, sender, receiver, senderUsername, receiverUsername, gasPrice, gasLimit, data, chainID, version, options, guardian, })](./sdk-core.transaction._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new Transaction object. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [options](./sdk-core.transaction.options.md) |  | [TransactionOptions](./sdk-core.transactionoptions.md) | The options field, useful for describing different settings available for transactions |
|  [version](./sdk-core.transaction.version.md) |  | [TransactionVersion](./sdk-core.transactionversion.md) | The version, required by the Network in order to correctly interpret the contents of the transaction. |
